Package database

Class SqLiteDBHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.SqLiteDBHandler

  • public class SqLiteDBHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an interface that can be used to store relevant simulation data in a SQLite database.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean createTablesCalled
      Indicates whether the createTables() method was called.
      private java.sql.Connection dbConnection
      Connection to the SQLite database.
      private java.text.SimpleDateFormat format
      Specifies the format in which dates are formatted for the output from and input to the database.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.sql.PreparedStatement> insertStatements
      Map of insert statements for all tables in the database.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.sql.PreparedStatement> selectAllBetweenDates
      Map of statements that can be used to request all records that have timestamp values that lie between two specific dates.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.sql.PreparedStatement> selectAllStatements
      Map of select statements for all tables in the database.

      • dbConnection

        private java.sql.Connection dbConnection
        Connection to the SQLite database.

      • insertStatements

      • selectAllStatements

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.sql.PreparedStatement> selectAllStatements
        Map of select statements for all tables in the database.

      • selectAllBetweenDates

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.sql.PreparedStatement> selectAllBetweenDates
        Map of statements that can be used to request all records that have timestamp values that lie between two specific dates. For each table in the databse, the map contains a separate statement.

      • format

        private java.text.SimpleDateFormat format
        Specifies the format in which dates are formatted for the output from and input to the database.

      • createTablesCalled

        private boolean createTablesCalled
        Indicates whether the createTables() method was called.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SqLiteDBHandler

        public SqLiteDBHandler​(java.lang.String databaseName)
        Connects to an existing database or creates a new database.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Name of the database to which the handler should connect or, in the case that no database with this name exists, the name of the newly created database.

    • Method Detail

      • createRecordTable

        private void createRecordTable​(java.lang.String name,
                               TableType tableType)
        Creates a new table of the specified type with the specified name within the database.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the newly created table.
        tableType - Value of TableType that indicates the type of the newly created table.

      • createRecordTables

        public void createRecordTables​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.util.Date simStart,
                               java.util.Date simEnd,
                               TableType tableType)
        Creates a new table of the specified type with the specified name within the database.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the newly created table.
        simStart - Start date of the simulation for which the database is used.
        simEnd - End date of the simulation for which the database is used.
        tableType - Value of TableType that corresponds to the type of the newly created table.

      • insertRecord

        public void insertRecord​(java.lang.String tableName,
                         DatabaseRecord record,
                         TableType tableType)
        Inserts a record into a table of the database.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table in which the record should be inserted.
        record - Instance of DatabaseRecord that corresponds to the record that should be inserted.
        tableType - Value of TableType that corresponds to the type of the table in which the record should be inserted.

        public void commit​()
        Perform commit on the database.

      • rollBack

        public void rollBack​()
        Perform roll back on the database.

      • getTableCatalog

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTableCatalog​()
        Retrieves a list of names of all currently existing tables in the database.
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of ArrayList that contains the names of all tables that currently exist in the database.

      • getResultTable

        public java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseRecord> getResultTable​(java.lang.String tableName)
        Retrieves all records from a table in the database.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table from which all records should be selected.
        Returns:
        An instance of ArrayList that contains all records from the specified table.

      • getPartialResultTable

        public java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseRecord> getPartialResultTable​(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<ColumnType> columns)
        Retrieves only a part of the column values for all records in a database table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table from which the data is requested.
        columns - Instance of ArrayList that contains values of ColumnType for all columns that should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        An instance of ArrayList that contains all records that are stored in the specified table.

      • getRecordsBetweenDates

        public java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseRecord> getRecordsBetweenDates​(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                  java.util.Date firstDate,
                                                                  java.util.Date lastDate)
        Retrieves all records from a database table that have a TIMESTAMP value that lies between the specified dates.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table from which the records should be retrieved.
        firstDate - First date of the interval in which the selected records are located.
        lastDate - Last date of the interval in which the selected records are located.
        Returns:
        An instance of ArrayList that contains all records that were selected based on the interval that is specified by the dates that were passed as parameters.

      • getRecordsBetween

        public java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseRecord> getRecordsBetween​(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                             ColumnType column,
                                                             java.lang.Object[] frame)
        Retrieves all records from a database tables for which the values of a specified column lie in a specified filter interval.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table from which the records are requested.
        column - Value of ColumnType that indicates the column that contains the values on which the selected records should be filtered.
        frame - Array of Object that contains the start and end values (in this order) of the interval that is used for the filtering of the records.
        Returns:
        List of all records that lie in the specified filter interval.

      • getStatistic

        public double getStatistic​(java.lang.String tableName,
                           ColumnType column,
                           StatisticType statistic)
        Retrieves a sql statistic value from a database table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table from which the statistic is requested.
        column - Value of ColumnType that corresponds to the column for which the statistic is requested.
        statistic - Value of StatisticType that indicates the statistic which is requested.
        Returns:
        Value of the specified sql statistic.

      • getStatisticWithFilter

        public double getStatisticWithFilter​(java.lang.String tableName,
                                     StatisticType statistic,
                                     ColumnType statisticColumn,
                                     java.util.List<ColumnType> filterColumns,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> filterFrames)
        Retrieves a sql statistic from all records of a database table that match one or several filtering intervals.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table for which the statistic is requested.
        statistic - Value of StatisticType that indicates the type of statistic that is requested.
        statisticColumn - Value of ColumnType that indicates the column for which the statistic is requested.
        filterColumns - List of one or several values of ColumnType that specify the columns on which the records that are used to calculate the statistic are filtered.
        filterFrames - List of Object arrays that specify the interval boundaries for the columns that are specified by the filterColumns parameter. The statistic is calculated on all records that lie within the specified filter intervals.
        Returns:
        Requested sql statistic value, which is calculated on the basis of all records that lie in the specified filter intervals. Thereby, the filter intervals are open intervals.

      • getRowCount

        public int getRowCount​(java.lang.String tableName)
        Retrieves the row count of a table in the database.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table for which the row count is requested.
        Returns:
        Row count of the specified table.

      • executeCustomQuery

        public java.util.List<DatabaseRecord> executeCustomQuery​(java.lang.String query)
        Executes a custom sql query on the database.
        Parameters:
        query - String that contains the custom sql query.
        Returns:
        List of records that the database result of the query contains.

      • createTestSetUp

        public void createTestSetUp​()
        Creates test setup for testing purposes.

      • createTableNameFromPrefix

        private java.lang.String createTableNameFromPrefix​(java.lang.String tablePrefix,
                                                   long timestamp)
        Creates the internal database table name (where for each "public" table name a separate table for each day in the simulation exists) from the external table name and a timestamp in simulation time.
        Parameters:
        tablePrefix - External table name of the table.
        timestamp - Timestamp in simulation time for which records are requested.
        Returns:
        Internal table name.

      • createUnionTableQuery

        private java.lang.String createUnionTableQuery​(java.lang.String tablePrefix)
        Creates a union of all tables that exist for an external table name.
        Parameters:
        tablePrefix - External table name.
        Returns:
        Union of all tables that exist for the external table name as sql query.

      • createUnionTableQueryBetweenDates

        private java.lang.String createUnionTableQueryBetweenDates​(java.lang.String tablePrefix,
                                                           long start,
                                                           long end)
        Creates union of all tables that exist for an external table name and contain records from the specified time interval.
        Parameters:
        tablePrefix - External table name of the requested table.
        start - Start date of the interval for the union.
        end - End date of the interval for the union.
        Returns:
        Union of all tables that exist for the external table name and contain records from the specified time interval as sql query.

      • executeQuery

        private java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery​(java.lang.String sqlQuery)
        Executes a sql query on the database.
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - Sql query that is executed as string representation.
        Returns:
        Database result for the executed query.

        Updates the maps of prepared statements for a specified database table.

      • convertResultSet

        private java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseRecord> convertResultSet​(java.sql.ResultSet entries)
        Converts a database result into a list of DatabaseRecord instances.
        Parameters:
        entries - Database result that is converted.
        Returns:
        List of DatabaseRecord instances that represent all records that are contained in the passed database result.

      • setValueInPreparedStatement

        private void setValueInPreparedStatement​(java.sql.PreparedStatement statement,
                                         ColumnType cType,
                                         java.lang.Object value,
                                         int index)
        Sets the variable values in an instance of PreparedStatement.
        Parameters:
        statement - Prepared statement for which the variable values are set.
        cType - Value of ColumnType that indicates the column type of the variable value that is set.
        value - Actual value that is set in the prepared statement.
        index - Indicates the index of the variable value that is set in the prepared statement.

      • createTableSchema

        private static java.lang.String createTableSchema​(TableType tableType)
        Creates the table schema as sql representation for a value of TableType.
        Parameters:
        tableType - Value of TableType that indicates the type schema that is created.
        Returns:
        Database table schema in sql respresentation.
